## Resumen del dataset

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

gtd %>%
  group_by(iyear, attacktype1_txt) %>%
  summarise(cantidad = n()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = iyear, y = cantidad, color = attacktype1_txt)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Ataques por a√±o y tipo",
       x = "A√±o",
       y = "N√∫mero de ataques",
       color = "Tipo de ataque") +
  theme_minimal()
```
